So, What exactly is Half Dead? Half Dead is a SinglePlayer/Multiplayer game which pits you and others (I presume, the multiplayer server list is currently bugged and I haven't tried it yet I am correct, that is what you do and the multiplayer is now fixed 1 day after this review) in a maze of random traps and you have to work your way through to find the Green button, how do you do this? Well you have 2 feet don't you? And what goes on feet? Shoes, so you have 2 shoes which you can fling into rooms and if there is a trap then it will activate it, if you spring a less deadly trap then you can quickly run it and grab it before the trap activates, if not and the room gets sealed off then unforunately you're down to 1 shoe. In its current state, and only because of how cheap it is, I would reccommend you check it out but mainly if you're Okay with playing it now for about 15 minutes if you can't get the multiplayer to work since Singleplayer isn't currently very exciting but it shows the concept of what the game is and allows you to get ready for Multiplayer.
You can now play multiplayer and it is much more entertaining, especially watching your friends or others run into a trap and get burned alive.

I would hope for Multiplayer there would be a way to be the trap setter, sort of like Fable Legends, but of course with rules and limits so you can't encase the players with sealed traps. This would create more unique experiences and would be pretty fun to watch people run about your maze.

I would also like to see maybe traps that are sealed but you can get out of so some aren't certain death but it would be hard to get out of, maybe random variations of each trap so you can't tell what to do straight away if you already know how to escape one of them.

The game is in the sort of stage that Who's Your Daddy is in where the games concept is there and it functions, Multiplayer apparently does work but like I said it's buggedMultiplayer Works fine!, but there is still a tonne more to be done with the game and if the developer works hard this game could be a very fun Multiplayer game and there's no reason why this won't get more popular over time.

I give the game an 8/10 for now in hopes the developer will continue to develop and expand on this great idea, I imagine my review score getting much higher if development goes well. I will update my review when I can and hopefully when big changes are made and also hopefully when the game fully gets released.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Please capitalize the first letter of the word 'dead' in the title. It bothers me so much.

Half Dead is a game similar to the 1997 film Cube, about a group of survivors navigating their way through a dangerous set of trap rooms. You and your friends are trapped in the maze of rooms, trying to reach the room with the exit, but if you are caught in a room with a trap, you most likely die. However, each player is aided with two shoes, which you can throw into rooms, testing if there is a trap present.

At this point, Half Dead hardly counts as a game. Most games follow the same formula: Throw shoe into room, wait for something to happen. If nothing happens, go into room. If something happens, don't go into room and wait until it is same to retrieve your shoe.

There's no strategy at all. You throw your shoe into a room and hope it doesn't blow up. From what I can tell, there's no pattern as to which rooms have traps versus which rooms don't. in the film Cube, there was a pattern to which rooms had traps. The graphics are fine, but it gets so laggy on public servers that you can barely get above 10 FPS. Not to mention the lack of traps.

Half Dead feels like a really good game that needs to have more variety and be much less random. At this point, I can't recommend it.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

IntroductionThis game is basically a newer and improved version of the cult 1997 film called Cube, this game feels like a newer up to date version of that film. It’s a first person, sci-fi game which has a variety of different rooms which could have the possbility of having something horrible that wants to kill you in that room.

GameplayThis game is basically a first person survival game. Your goal in each run is to find the exit which is in a specific room whilst you avoid not getting killed by all of the traps that you encounter in the rooms before that exit room. A mechanic that you will want to use as much as possible is being able to throw your shoe into the room to see if there is a trap in the room. Sometimes this will save you from your death rather than running into the room straight away. Obviously you only have 2 shoes to use, so using your shoes wisely, or should we call it luck, is going to be essential for each run that you play fo this game. You are able to play with friends if they own this game as well, if not then you can go on the servers that the game provides. The only problem there is that because this game is still in Early Access is that there aren’t really anyone on these servers yet, so playing single player might be the only way to play the game for the moment if you haven’t got a friend who can play the game with you as well. It can be rather funny sometimes when you are both trying to find the exit floor before you both lose your shoes to the traps that occur in almost every room. Something else that is funny about playing with friends is that you can watch them die from traps in sometimes comical ways, such as being burnt alive, getting eletrocuted and such as you just stand there and watch them die. Unless of course you are the one dying then you will just be annoyed while your friend laughs at your comical deaht. Although, after a while of seeing your friends die or yourself die it does get old pretty quicly, and just becomes rather rage enducing than anything else. I am hoping that they add a bit more variety of traps and possibly more advanced mechanics rather than just being able to throw your shoe on the ground.

The graphics in this game aren’t really much to talk about. Each room is pratically the same as the last, except it’ll have a different trap in it once you set the trap off. I do like the suits that you wear on your character, although you can really only see that if you are playing with other people. I would like to see possibly different coloured room, rather than the same room over and over again, because for me it did get a little boring to see the same room over and over again.

Pros+ Funny to watch die sometimes, although gets old rather quickly
+ If you have friends who have this game it’s fun to play with them rather than single player
+ The graphics are nicely presented, although get rather boring after a while
+ It’s fairly simple to play
+ For the amount it’s asking for right now, it’s definatly worth it
+ The game is definatly worth the money it's asking for

Cons- Sometimes the run can be purely luck based
- The game has a great concept, but theres a lot more that needs to be added/low content

Result / Final ThoughtsFor the game being in early access it seems to have the potiential to be a really fun experience for everyone, espically with others. But for the time being there is low content in the game, and it does get a little repetitve if you play for extended periods of time. I really like the concept of the game, and hope that the developers will add loads more content to make this game really good when it comes to full release.

Rating: 7.5/10
